body:
var ${1:config} = {
	mark: '',
	port: 4848,
	appname: '',
	host: '',
	prefix: '',
	origin: '',
	isSecure: true|false,
	rejectUnauthorized: true|false,
	headers: ''|{},
	ticket: ''|false,
	key: ''|null,
	cert: ''|null,
	ca: ''|null,
	pfx: ''|null,
	passphrase: ''|null,
	identity: '',
	debug: true|false,
	disconnect: ''
}

qsocks.global.abortAll.description: Sets an abort flag on all pending and ongoing requests in the current engine session.

qsocks.global.getProgress.description: Gives information about the progress of the DoReload and DoSave calls.

qsocks.global.openDoc.description: Opens an app and checks if the app needs to be migrated (if the app is deprecated).

qsocks.global.oSName.description: Returns the name of the operating system.

qsocks.getInteract.description: Retrieves information on the user interaction that is requested by the engine.

qsocks.getUniqueID.description: Returns the unique identifier of the endpoint for the current user in the current app.

qsocks.interactDone.description: Informs the engine that a user interaction (which was earlier requested by the engine) was performed and indicates the engine what to do next.

qsocks.getAuthenticatedUser.description: Retrieves information about the authenticated user.

qsocks.createDocEx.description: Creates an app and opens an engine session.

qsocks.getActiveDoc.description: Returns the handle of the current app.

qsocks.allowCreateApp.description: Indicates whether or not a user is able to create an app.

qsocks.createSessionAppFromApp.description: Creates a session app from a source app.

qsocks.deleteApp.description: Deletes an app from the Qlik Sense repository or from the file system.

qsocks.isDesktopMode.description: Indicates whether or not the user works in standalone mode.

qsocks.getBNF.description: Returns a set of rules defining the Qlik Sense scripting language grammar. These rules define the syntax for the script statements and the script or chart functions.

qsocks.getLogicalDriveStrings.description: Lists the logical drives in the system.

qsocks.getOdbcDsns.description: Returns the list of the ODBC connectors that are installed in the system.

qsocks.getOleDbProviders.description: Returns the list of the OLEDB providers installed on the system.

qsocks.getCustomConnectors.description: List the custom connectors available in the system.

qsocks.cancelReload.description: Cancels an ongoing reload. The reload of the app is stopped. The indexation can be canceled and true is still the return value of the reload task.

qsocks.cancelRequest.description: Cancels an ongoing request. The request is stopped.

qsocks.configureReload.description: Configures the engine's behavior during a reload.

qsocks.getDefaultAppFolder.description: Returns the folder where the apps are stored.

qsocks.getFolderItemsForPath.description: Returns the files and folders located at a specified path.

qsocks.getFunctions.description: Gets the list of all the script functions.

qsocks.copyApp.description: Copies an app that is in the Qlik Sense repository.

qsocks.importApp.description: Imports an app to the Qlik Sense repository.

qsocks.importAppEx.description: Imports an app to the Qlik Sense repository. The connections in the app can be excluded from the import.

qsocks.exportApp.description: Exports an app from the Qlik Sense repository to the file system.

qsocks.replaceAppFromID.description: Replaces an app with the objects from a source app.

qsocks.isValidConnectionString.description: Description: Checks if a connection string is valid.

qsocks.oSVersion.description: Returns the version number of the operating system.

qsocks.getAppEntry.description: Retrieves the meta data of an app.

qsocks.productVersion.description: Returns the Qlik Sense version number.

qsocks.isPersonalMode.description: Indicates whether or not the user works in personal mode.

qsocks.qvVersion.description: Returns the Qlik Sense version number.

qsocks.field.getCardinal.description: Retrieves the number of distinct values in a field.

qsocks.field.getAndMode.description: Returns the AND mode status of a field.

qsocks.field.setAndMode.description: Sets a field in the AND mode.

qsocks.field.lowLevelSelect.description: Selects some values in a field, by entering the element numbers related to the values to select.

qsocks.field.select.description: Selects field values matching a search string.

qsocks.field.toggleSelect.description: Toggle selects field values matching a search string.

qsocks.field.clearAllButThis.description: Maintains the selections in the current field while clearing the selections in the other fields.

qsocks.field.selectPossible.description: Selects all possible values in a specific field.

qsocks.field.selectAll.description: Selects all values of a field. Excluded values are also selected.

qsocks.field.selectValues.description: Selects some values in a field, by entering the values to select.

qsocks.field.clear.description: Clears the selections in a specific field.

qsocks.field.lock.description: Locks all selected values of a specific field.

qsocks.field.unlock.description: Unlocks all selected values of a specific field if the target (or handle ) is a field.

qsocks.field.selectAlternative.description: Description: Selects all alternatives values in a specific field.

qsocks.field.getNxProperties.description: Gets the properties of a field.

qsocks.field.setNxProperties.description: Sets some properties to a field.

qsocks.bookmark.applyPatches.description: Applies a patch to the properties of an object. Allows an update to some of the properties.

qsocks.bookmark.getLayout.description: Evaluates an object and displays its properties including the dynamic properties.

qsocks.bookmark.getProperties.description: Shows the properties of an object.

qsocks.bookmark.getInfo.description: Returns: the type of the object and the identifier of the object

qsocks.bookmark.setProperties.description: Sets some properties for a bookmark.

qsocks.dimension.getLayout.description: Evaluates a dimension and displays its properties, including the dynamic properties.

qsocks.dimension.applyPatches.description: Applies a patch to the properties of an object. Allows an update to some of the properties.

qsocks.dimension.setProperties.description: Sets some properties for a dimension.

qsocks.dimension.getProperties.description: Shows the properties of an object.

qsocks.dimension.getInfo.description: Returns the type and identifier of the object.

qsocks.dimension.getDimension.description: Returns the definition of a dimension.

qsocks.dimension.getLinkedObjects.description: Lists the linked objects to a generic object, a dimension or a measure.

qsocks.measure.getLayout.description: Evaluates a measure and displays its properties, including the dynamic properties.

qsocks.measure.applyPatches.description: Applies a patch to the properties of an object. Allows an update to some of the properties.

qsocks.measure.setProperties.description: Sets some properties for a measure.

qsocks.measure.getProperties.description: Shows the properties of an object.

qsocks.measure.getInfo.description: Returns the type and identifier of the object.

qsocks.measure.getMeasure.description: Returns the definition of a measure.

qsocks.measure.getLinkedObjects.description: Lists the linked objects to a generic object, a measure or a measure.

qsocks.variable.getProperties.description: Shows the properties of an object.

qsocks.variable.applyPatches.description: Applies a patch to the properties of a variable. Allows an update to some of the properties.

qsocks.variable.getInfo.description: Returns the type and identifier of the object.

qsocks.variable.getLayout.description: Evaluates an object and displays its properties including the dynamic properties.

qsocks.variable.setProperties.description: Sets some properties for a variable.

qsocks.variable.setDualValue.description: Sets the value of a dual variable.

qsocks.variable.setNumValue.description: Sets a numerical value to a variable.

qsocks.variable.setStringValue.description: Sets a string value to a variable.

qsocks.variable.forceContent.description: Sets the value of a dual variable overriding any input constraints.

qsocks.variable.getContent.description: Returns the calculated value of a variable.

qsocks.variable.getNxProperties.description: Gets the properties of a variable.

qsocks.variable.getRawContent.description: Returns the raw value of a variable.

qsocks.variable.setContent.description: Sets a value to a variable.

qsocks.variable.setNxProperties.description: Sets some properties to a variable.

qsocks.doc.commitDraft.description: Commits the draft of an object that was previously created by invoking the CreateDraft method.

qsocks.doc.createDraft.description: Creates a draft of an object.

qsocks.doc.getProperties.description: Gets the properties of an app.

qsocks.doc.addFieldFromExpression.description: Adds a field on the fly.

qsocks.doc.findMatchingFields.description: etrieves any fields that belong to the same archipelago as the specified field and that match at least one of the specified tags.

qsocks.doc.getMatchingFields.description: Retrieves any fields that match all or one of the specified tags in the data model of an app.

qsocks.doc.getField.description: Retrieves the handle of a field.

qsocks.doc.getFieldDescription.description: etrieves the description of a field.

qsocks.doc.getLooselyCoupledVector.description: Returns a vector of loosely coupled state flags, one element for each table in the app.

qsocks.doc.setLooselyCoupledVector.description: Sets a vector of loosely coupled state flags, one element for each table in the app.

qsocks.doc.backCount.description: Returns the number of entries on the Back stack.

qsocks.doc.forwardCount.description: Returns the number of entries on the Forward stack.

qsocks.doc.clearAll.description: Clears all selections in all fields of the current app.

qsocks.doc.lockAll.description: Locks all selections in all fields of the current app.

qsocks.doc.unlockAll.description: Unlocks all selections in all fields of the current app.

qsocks.doc.back.description: oads the last logical operation  (if any).

qsocks.doc.forward.description: Loads the next logical operation (if any).

qsocks.doc.getAllInfos.description: Returns the identifier and the type of any generic object in the app.

qsocks.doc.getAssociationScores.description: Computes a set of association scores for each pair of fields between two given tables that have been loaded in an app.

qsocks.doc.getViewDlgSaveInfo.description: Retrieves information about the position of the tables in the data model viewer.

qsocks.doc.setViewDlgSaveInfo.description: Sets the positions of the tables in the data model viewer.

qsocks.doc.getEmptyScript.description: Creates a script that contains one section. This section contains Set statements that give localized information from the regional settings of the computer.

qsocks.doc.doReload.description: Reloads the script that is set in an app.

qsocks.doc.doReloadEx.description: Reloads the script that is set in an app and returns the path to the script log file.

qsocks.doc.getScriptBreakpoints.description: Lists the breakpoints in the script of an app.

qsocks.doc.setScriptBreakpoints.description: Set some breakpoints in the script of an app.

qsocks.doc.getTextMacros.description: Fetches updated variables after a statement execution.

qsocks.doc.setFetchLimit.description: Limits the number of rows of data to load from a data source.

qsocks.doc.doSave.description: Saves an app. All objects and data in the data model are saved.

qsocks.doc.getTableData.description: Retrieves the data of a specific table.

qsocks.doc.getAppProperties.description: Gets the properties of an app.

qsocks.doc.createSessionObject.description: Creates a transient object. For example, you can use a transient object to create an app overview or a story overview.

qsocks.doc.getObject.description: Returns the type of the app object and the corresponding handle.

qsocks.doc.cloneObject.description: Clones any visualizations, sheets and stories. The clone method works for both app objects and child objects.

qsocks.doc.clearUndoBuffer.description: Clears entirely the undo and redo buffer.

qsocks.doc.destroyDraft.description: Removes the draft of an object.

qsocks.doc.getDimension.description: Returns the handle of a dimension.

qsocks.doc.getMeasure.description: Returns the handle of a measure.

qsocks.doc.checkExpression.description: Checks if a given expression is valid.

qsocks.doc.addAlternateState.description: Adds an alternate state in the app.

qsocks.doc.removeAlternateState.description: Removes an alternate state in the app.

qsocks.doc.checkScriptSyntax.description: Checks the syntax of a script.

qsocks.doc.getConnections.description: ists the connections in an app.

qsocks.doc.getDatabaseInfo.description: Gives information about an ODBC, OLEDB or CUSTOMconnection. See GetDatabaseInfo method for more details.

qsocks.doc.getDatabases.description: Lists the databases inside a ODBC, OLEDB or CUSTOM data source.

qsocks.doc.getDatabaseOwners.description: Lists the owners of a database for a ODBC, OLEDB or CUSTOM connection.

qsocks.doc.getDatabaseTables.description: Description: Lists the tables inside a database for a ODBC, OLEDB or CUSTOMconnection.

qsocks.doc.getDatabaseTableFields.description: Lists the fields inside a table of a database for a ODBC, OLEDB or CUSTOMconnection.

qsocks.doc.getDatabaseTablePreview.description: Retrieves the values of the specified table of a database for a ODBC, OLEDBor CUSTOMconnection.

qsocks.doc.guessFileType.description: Guesses the data format for a given file.

qsocks.doc.getFileTables.description: Lists the tables for a folder connection.

qsocks.doc.getFileTablesEx.description: Lists the tables and fields of a JSON or XML file for a folder connection.

qsocks.doc.getFileTableFields.description: Lists the fields of a table  for a folder connection.

qsocks.doc.getFolderItemsForConnection.description: Lists the items for a folder connection.

qsocks.doc.sendGenericCommandToCustomCon.description: Sends a generic command to a custom connector.

qsocks.doc.getFavoriteVariables.description: Retrieves the variables that are tagged as favorite.

qsocks.doc.getBookmark.description: Returns the handle of a bookmark.

qsocks.doc.resume.description: Resumes the app as the user left it.

qsocks.doc.abortModal.description: Aborts any selection mode in an app. For more information about selection mode, see BeginSelections method.

qsocks.doc.publish.description: Publishes an app.   The published app can have a different name than the original app.

qsocks.doc.saveObjects.description: Saves all objects that were modified in the app.

qsocks.doc.selectAssociations.description: Selects all search hits for a specified group.

qsocks.doc.getLibraryContent.description: Returns the content of a library.

qsocks.doc.getVariableById.description: Gets the handle of a variable.

qsocks.doc.getVariableByName.description: Gets the handle of a variable.

qsocks.doc.evaluate.description: Evaluates an expression as a string.

qsocks.doc.evaluateEx.description: Evaluates an expression as a dual.

qsocks.doc.searchObjects.description: Returns the generic objects corresponding to one or more search terms. The search is performed within the title, subtitle, footnote and type. In addition, associated dimension values are also searched in. For example, if the country Japan is selected and the object contains the dimension City, the object will appear in the results for Osaka but not for Johannesburg. The generic objects with the following types will never appear in the results: slideitem, sheet, story, slide, masterobject, snapshot, LoadModel, appprops.

qsocks.doc.searchResults.description: Returns the search matches for one or more search terms.

qsocks.doc.getVariable.description: Gets the handle of a variable.

qsocks.doc.searchAssociations.description: Returns the search matches for one or more search terms.
